Positive pathway.Positive follow on question: Good job! Resolving conflicts isn’t always easy. How was your experience? (Great/Neutral/Bad)

List of challenges.Message: Sorry to hear this. What was difficult for you about resolving conflicts between you and your partner?

Option 1: I didn’t stay calm during a di.Message: It can be really hard to stay calm when we’re having a disagreement with others. Try to think of something that you can do that might help like taking a couple deep breaths.

Option 2: I got angry and yelled at my p.Message: By taking a pause before responding, it can help us stay calm and respond better. When you feel yourself getting angry, try taking a pause. You can do this!

Option 3: My partner got angry and yelle.Message: Sometimes others respond to us negatively when we’re having a disagreement. In these situations, it is sometimes best to walk away for a bit until those involved have calmed down.

Option 4: I forgot to take a pause when.Message: It can be easy to forget, but don’t give up! Next time when you start feeling angry, try taking a deep breath before responding. You can also try walking away for a bit if you start feeling frustrated.
